entry.title: New P2P commands for diagnostics, SPV clients
entry.summary: In a discussion thread started by Jeff Garzik on June 15, 2012, regarding the synchronization of full node mempool at startup, he expressed his preference for the organic growth and random nature of mempools. He remained on the fence about the issue but noted that miners would likely want it to get fee-paying transactions quickly. Meanwhile, Matt shared his thoughts by stating that he didn't particularly care either way.
